Package mireka.list

Provides a simple mailing list, which can be used for small, closed, internal mailing lists, if a full mailing list manager software is not available.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MailValidator MailValidator validates a mail based on its content, in contrast to validating based on the mail envelope.
 

Class Summary
ListDestination A ListDestination assigned to a recipient indicates that the mail should be redistributed to multiple recipients.
ListMember Member holds information about a mailing list member.
MailingList Very simple mailing list implementation suitable for small, closed, internal lists.
MailingLists MailingLists is a collection of mailing lists, used in the configuration files.
ParsedMail ParsedMail encompasses both the original Mail object and the mail body lazily parsed into a MimeMessage format.
SubjectRegexpValidator SubjectRegexpValidator accepts a mail if its subject matches the specified regular expression pattern.
 

Package mireka.list Description

Provides a simple mailing list, which can be used for small, closed, internal mailing lists, if a full mailing list manager software is not available.
